messages.subject: Re: Gene Simmons was- charging 18 year olds rent
messages.msgSnippet: I also hung out at the Troubadour a lot in the late 80 s, my boyfriend (later my dh) was in a band! Emily
messages.messageBody:
I also hung out at the Troubadour a lot in the late 80's, my
boyfriend (later my dh) was in a band!

Emily

messages.subject: Re: Gene Simmons was- charging 18 year olds rent
messages.msgSnippet: *************** I had gone to see a friend from high school (we were both living in LA at the time) play with his band at the Troubador (sp?). ****************
messages.messageBody:
***************
I had gone to see a friend from high school (we were
both living in LA at the time) play with his band at the Troubador
(sp?).

****************

LOL! I worked there, as a cocktail waitress, for 8 months in 1987/88! Those were the days of the glamour boys with the big hair and eyeliner <g>. Brings back some fun memories :-)



Meghan

"Everything Is Possible"
~ Deepak Chopra
